disk.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a small flat piece of plastic or metal which is used for storing computer or electronic information
disk.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the usual American spelling of disc
disk.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a flat circular piece of plastic or metal used for storing computer information
disk.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: There are a number of products which allow PC disks to be read or written from a Macintosh.
Can you send me your report on disk?
